sprout: Greetings,Please select a department by entering '#Sprout' followed by the department code (e.g., #Sprout 04)

01: Please select an issue to generate a support ticket. A Green Team representative will contact you shortly. Example '#sprout c5'
C1. Unable to access cloud storage.
C5. Data loss from cloud storage.
C7. Inability to connect to cloud services.

02: Please select an issue to generate a support ticket. A Green Team representative will contact you shortly. Example '#sprout i5'
I3. Error messages during system boot.

03: Please select an issue to generate a support ticket. A Green Team representative will contact you shortly. Example '#sprout n5'
N10. Suspicious activity on the network.

04: Please select an issue to generate a support ticket. A Green Team representative will contact you shortly. Example '#sprout s5'

05: Please select an issue to generate a support ticket. A Green Team representative will contact you shortly. Example '#sprout p5'
P3. Low ink or toner levels.
P6. Inability to print certain file formats.

06: Please select an issue to generate a support ticket. A Green Team representative will contact you shortly. Example '#sprout w5'

07: Greetings, It seems none of the issues above apply to your problem. A Green Team member will call you back shortly

default: I'm sorry, I don't understand that. Type 'menu' or 'sprout' to see available options.
support_greeting: Hello! ðŸ‘‹ I'm here to help you. Please type #sprout to see our support menu and get assistance.

greetings.hello: Hi there! Type #sprout to see our support menu.
greetings.hi: Hello! Type #sprout to see how I can assist you today.
greetings.greetings: Greetings! Type #sprout to see our support menu.
greetings.how do you do?: Hello! I'm doing well, thank you. Type #sprout to see how I can assist you today.
greetings.good morning: Good morning! Type #sprout to see our support menu.
greetings.good evening: Good evening! Type #sprout to see our support menu.
greetings.good afternoon: Good afternoon! Type #sprout to see our support menu.
